columns.description: Batch is transitioning its core quota system for dedicated cores to be enforced per Virtual Machine family. During this transitional phase, the dedicated core quota per Virtual Machine family may not yet be enforced.

columns.description: The low priority core quota of the batch account.

columns.description: A list of the dedicated core quota per virtual machine family for the batch account.

columns.name: encryption
columns.description: Properties to enable customer managed key for the batch account.

columns.description: The identity of the batch account.
